title: Simplest example
description: Simplest use of a tag, no additional options.
The media source type is detected from the file extension and stereoscopy by the word 'mono' (details of the parameter guessing algorithm are in the README.md file)
There is only one video source provided in the shorthand <tt>bivrost-player[url]</tt> tag. It's best to provide an alternate video source, like a webm - to do that use a <tt>bivrost-media</tt> tag

title: All available options provided with defaults
description: All options provided. They are all their default values except of <tt>bivrost-media[type]</tt> which is normally undefined.

title: Properly configured example
description: All options provided. Nothing is autodetected, everything is specified.

title: Cubemap
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format.

title: Cubemap stereo (side-by-side)
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format. Stereoscopic version.

title: Cubemap stereo (faceook two by three)
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format. Facebook version.

title: Cubemap horizontal cross
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format. Horizontal cross.

title: Cubemap vertical cross
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format. Vertical cross.

title: Cubemap stereo (custom)
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format. Facebook version.

title: Cubemap facebook movie
description: Panorama in the less common cubemap format. The format used by Facebook

title: Looping video
description: Example with looping enabled

title: Modified size
description: Normally the size of the player is autodetected from available width and preset aspect ratio of 4:3. You can override this with css style or class and the player will adapt.

title: Static panoramas
description: The 360WebPlayer can also display pictures

title: Top And Bottom stereoscopy
description: A stereoscopic render using an top-and-bottom oriented image.

title: Unminified javascript
description: This is a development copy without javascript compilation by closure compiler.

title: Default theme
description: The default theme, explicitly stated.
You can ommit this theme class as it is the default.

title: Winter theme
description: A gray-bluish theme

title: Spring theme
description: A black and green theme

title: Autumn theme
description: An orange theme with a floral design

title: Turquoise theme
description: A blue-pinkish theme
